document.heading: Retired Police Officer Redeployment Temporary Amendment Act of 1992

history.narrative: Law 9-132, the “Retired Police Officer Redeployment Temporary Amendment Act of 1992,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-487. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 7, 1992, and May 6, 1992, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 28, 1992, it was assigned Act No. 9-217 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 9-132 became effective on July 22, 1992.
